subject: Dear
body:
Dear
How are you doing today? I pray my email finds you well and in good health.
This communication is to inform you that I have discussed with the Bank directors of the paying Bank in UNITED KINGDOM reserved bank, and it is confirmed that payment is ongoing as that your name has been shortlisted as part of the beneficiary who will benefit from the payment exercise.
The Bank has further assured me that there will be no up front payment from the beneficiary whatsoever as that you are not required to pay any money hence you are required to fly down to MEXICO for the signing of your funds release documents and proceed to HONG KONG to receive your payment.
The Bank will take care of all expenses such as your flight going to MEXICO and HONG KONG including your returning back to your home country. The Bank will also pay for your hotel reservation during this three days Bank meeting in MEXICO and two days in HONG KONG to receive your payment. If you can make this trip to MEXICO  and HONG KONG then I shall need the below information for perfection of your flight ticket alongside your hotel booking.
1.Name of your nearest Airport
2.Attach Valid International Passport
3.Direct Telephone Number For Easy communication.
As soon as I receive this information then I shall commence payment proceedings to ensure no lapses this time.
NB: REPLY ONLY ON MY CONFIDENTIAL EMAIL ADDRESS: 
infounms4@gmail.com
Expect your valued response.
Sincerely Yours.
Mrs. K. Georgieva.
Managing Director,
International Monetary Fund.(IMF).
London,UK.

subject: Re:  Dear
body:
Dear Mrs. K. Georgieva,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope this email finds you well too. I must say, your offer sounds quite interesting. However, I have a few questions before proceeding.

1. Could you please provide more details about the payment exercise? How was my name selected to benefit from it?

2. What exactly will be discussed during the three-day bank meeting in Mexico? Is there any specific agenda or purpose for this meeting?

3. Can you clarify why I need to fly to Hong Kong after the meeting in Mexico? What is the reason for receiving the payment there?

4. How can I be assured that there won't be any upfront payments required from me? Are there any legal documents or agreements that can guarantee this?

5. Is it possible for me to have a contact person at the bank who can provide further information and assist me throughout this process?

I appreciate your time and assistance in answering these questions. Once I have all the necessary information, I will be able to make an informed decision regarding this opportunity.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Juan

subject: MY ANSWER TO YOUR QUESTIONS.
body:
Attention:Juan.

Thanks for mail dated 8 Fed with your enclosed questions, Find below
answers to your questions as numbered:


1. Could you please provide more details about the payment exercise? How
was my name selected to benefit from it? Your name was shortlisted as one
of the beneficiaries who will benefit in this exercise.I will send you
proof of fund documents as soon as you send your details.

2. What exactly will be discussed during the three-day bank meeting in
Mexico? Is there any specific agenda or purpose for this meeting?, You are
going for KYC ie; know your client also to sign your fund release documents
in Mexico.

3. Can you clarify why I need to fly to Hong Kong after the meeting in
Mexico? What is the reason for receiving the payment there? The reason for
receiving the payment is for COVID compensation. Also, the reason you need
to travel to HONG KONG to receive the payment is because HONG KONG is our
payment centre.

4. How can I be assured that there won't be any upfront payments required
from me? Are there any legal documents or agreements that can guarantee
this? Be rest assured there will be no upfront payment or advance payment
till you receive your payment because the bank sponsor will pay for your
flight ticket and hotel reservation for your round trip including your
feeding. I will send you proof of fund ownership as soon as you send your
full name, address, name of your airport and a copy of your passport.

5. Is it possible for me to have a contact person at the bank who can
provide further information and assist me throughout this process?, YES, I
made a special arrangement for a bank official to meet you in your hotel
room with the documents for you to sign to avoid much stress in the banking
hall which might delay in concluding this transaction very fast. The bank
official will assist you throughout your stay and get all you need for your
conducive stay in Mexico likewise in Hong Kong.

Finally, You should understand you will receive the sum $5,500,000.00musd
in Hong Kong after signing your fund release order documents in Mexico.Be
informed this transaction is legitimate and real so you have nothing worry
about because it has nothing to do with illegality.You should understand
your security is highly guaranteed on your round trip.

NB: You can reach my personal assistant Mr. Holliday Colin on this whatsapp
number for more details: +447700304589.

Waiting for your valued response.

Yours Sincerely,

Mrs. K Georgieva.

subject: Re: MY ANSWER TO YOUR QUESTIONS.
body:
Dear Mrs. Georgieva,

Thank you for your prompt response and for providing more information about the payment exercise. I appreciate your assurance that there won't be any upfront payments required from me. It's a relief to know that the bank sponsor will cover my travel expenses.

I'm curious about the purpose of the bank meeting in Mexico. Could you please explain what KYC (know your client) entails? Also, what kind of fund release documents will I need to sign during this meeting?

Additionally, I would like to know more about the payment center in Hong Kong. Is there a specific reason why it was chosen as the location for receiving the payment? And could you clarify how COVID is related to this process?

Lastly, it's reassuring to hear that there will be a bank official who can assist me throughout this process. Will they be available 24/7 in case I have any questions or concerns?

Thank you once again for your time and assistance.

Best wishes,
Juan

subject: RESPOND ACCORDINGLY.
body:
PLEASE IF YOU ARE REAL AND NOT A ROBOT CONTACT ME PERSONAL ASSISTANT MR.
HOLLIDAY COLIN TO EXPLAIN BETTER FOR BECAUSE I AM SO BUSY RIGHT AT WORK.

HERE IS MR. HOLLIDAY COLIN WHATSAPP NUMBER: +447700304589.
THANKS,

GEORGIEVA,

subject: Re: RESPOND ACCORDINGLY.
body:
Hello Mr. Holliday Colin,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope you're doing well. I'm interested in hearing more about what you have to share. Could you please provide me with some details about the information you would like to discuss? I appreciate your understanding that I prefer to communicate through this platform rather than sharing personal contact information.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Juan

subject: Re: RESPOND ACCORDINGLY.
body: I THINK YOU ARE NOT SERIOUS

subject: Re: RESPOND ACCORDINGLY.
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I assure you that I am serious and interested in hearing what you have to share. Please go ahead and tell me more about the information you would like to share.

Best wishes,
Juan
